name: 1001 Lies
description:
1001 Lies

You find yourself in a dark cave with nothing but a golden lamp. The genie inside will grant you a wish, if you can figure out his puzzle...

Controls

We will change these ASAP, but for now:

Pick up object/Put object on pedestal: P

Throw object: F

Push sliding block: Space

Talk/Confirm: E

We made this game for the Community Game Jam! We ran pretty close on time, so let us know if you find any bugs and give us your feedback!

Our team consisted of:
